Mix.Description: Mix up to three items together for a new effect.

Sap.Description: Drain enemy HP and gain HP.

Tame.Description: Lose current companion to take an enemy beast as a new companion. 50% possibility on beasts. 1% possibility on people.

Hide.Description: Become invincible to physical attacks for a short time.

Chance.Description: Use probability to deal damage. Failure results in harming the caster.

Remedy.Description: Remove negative status effects from one ally.

Holy.Description: Attack all enemies with Holy Magic.

Burn.Description: Attack all enemies with Fire Magic.

Surf.Description: Attack all enemies with Water Magic.

Quake.Description: Attack all enemies with Earth Magic.

Gust.Description: Attack all enemies with Air Magic.

Lightning.Description: Attack all enemies with Electric Magic.

Blizzard.Description: Attack all enemies with Ice Magic.

Shadow.Description: Attack all enemies with Dark Magic.

Gravity.Description: Halve current HP of all enemies.

Berserk.Description: Double Strength and Speed of target. Target will only use Attack.
